name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForAdministrationOfRemdesivir
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Administration of Remdesivir
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to administration of remdesivir.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes introduction of remdesivir into central or peripheral veins via open or percutaneous routes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes administration of other antivirals (e.g., oseltamivir) and routes of administration that do not involve open or percutaneous procedures (i.e. oral administration).)

concept.display: Introduction of Remdesivir Anti-infective into Peripheral Vein, Percutaneous Approach, New Technology Group 5
Introduction of Remdesivir Anti-infective into Central Vein, Percutaneous Approach, New Technology Group 5

contains.display: Introduction of Remdesivir Anti-infective into Peripheral Vein, Percutaneous Approach, New Technology Group 5
Introduction of Remdesivir Anti-infective into Central Vein, Percutaneous Approach, New Technology Group 5
